message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product which I believe would be highly beneficial for you. Considering its value, I'm offering it at $1,400,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, considering my budget constraints, I am willing to pay up to $1,350,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm confident this product offers you even greater value than that. How about we meet in the middle at $1,375,000?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay up to $1,360,000 for it.
